DOC.brief_summary: The insulinotropic effect protein hydrolysate/amino acid ingestion show regulate blood glucose homeostasis type 2 diabetes patient normoglycemic control . The objective study investigate optimal dose insulinotropic mixture .
DOC.criteria: Male Age 40 70 year Oral blood glucose lower medication BMI < 35 kg/m2 Exogenous insulin use Cardiac disease ( cardiac event last 5 year ) Diabetic complication ( microvascular complication , microalbuminuria : albumin : creatinine ratio > 2,5 )
